verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> mas-Sa The burden צֹ֑ר <S%H6865><s%> Tzor; of Tyre הֵילִ֣ילוּ׀ <S%H3213><s%> hei-Li-lu Howl אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <S%H591><s%> o-ni-Yot ye ships תַּרְשִׁ֗ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> tar-Shish, of Tarshish כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for שֻׁדַּ֤ד <S%H7703><s%> shud-Dad for it is laid waste מִבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> mib-Ba-yit so that there is no house מִבּ֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> mib-Bo, no entering in מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz from the land כִּתִּ֖ים <S%H3794><s%> kit-Tim of Chittim נִגְלָה־ <S%H1540><s%> nig-lah- it is revealed לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

דֹּ֖מּוּ <S%H1826><s%> Dom-mu Be still יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> Yo-she-vei ye inhabitants אִ֑י <S%H339><s%> 'I; of the isle סֹחֵ֥ר <S%H5503><s%> so-Cher thou whom the merchants צִיד֛וֹן <S%H6721><s%> tzi-Don of Zidon עֹבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> 'o-Ver that pass over יָ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> yam the sea מִלְאֽוּךְ׃ <S%H4390><s%> mil-'Uch. have replenished

וּבְמַ֤יִם <S%H4325><s%> u-ve-Ma-yim waters רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim And by great זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra' the seed שִׁחֹ֔ר <S%H7883><s%> shi-Chor, of Sihor קְצִ֥יר <S%H7105><s%> ke-Tzir the harvest יְא֖וֹר <S%H2975><s%> ye-'or of the river תְּבֽוּאָתָ֑הּ <S%H8393><s%> te-vu-'a-Tah; [is] her revenue וַתְּהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi is a סְחַ֥ר <S%H5505><s%> se-Char and she is a mart גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim. of nations

בּ֣וֹשִׁי <S%H954><s%> Boo-shi Be thou ashamed צִיד֔וֹן <S%H6721><s%> tzi-Don, O Zidon כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar hath spoken יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam, for the sea מָע֥וֹז <S%H4581><s%> ma-'oz [even] the strength הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam of the sea לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have neither חַ֣לְתִּי <S%H2342><s%> Chal-ti I travail וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor יָלַ֗דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad-ti, not nor bring forth children וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have neither גִדַּ֛לְתִּי <S%H1431><s%> gid-Dal-ti neither do I nourish up בַּחוּרִ֖ים <S%H970><s%> ba-chu-Rim young men רוֹמַ֥מְתִּי <S%H7311><s%> ro-Mam-ti [nor] bring up בְתוּלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1330><s%> ve-tu-Lot. virgins

כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher- after שֵׁ֖מַע <S%H8088><s%> She-ma' As at the report לְמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> le-mitz-Ra-yim; concerning Egypt יָחִ֖ילוּ <S%H2342><s%> ya-Chi-lu [so] shall they be sorely pained כְּשֵׁ֥מַע <S%H8088><s%> ke-She-ma' at the report צֹֽר׃ <S%H6865><s%> Tzor. of Tyre

עִבְר֖וּ <S%H5674><s%> 'iv-Ru Pass ye over תַּרְשִׁ֑ישָׁה <S%H8659><s%> tar-Shi-shah; to Tarshish הֵילִ֖ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> hei-Li-lu howl יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> Yo-she-vei ye inhabitants אִֽי׃ <S%H339><s%> 'I. of the isle

הֲזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> ha-Zot likewise לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem עַלִּיזָ֑ה <S%H5947><s%> 'al-li-Zah; [Is] this your joyous מִֽימֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> mi-mei- age קֶ֤דֶם <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem [is] of ancient קַדְמָתָהּ֙ <S%H6927><s%> kad-ma-Tah [city] whose antiquity יֹבִל֣וּהָ <S%H2986><s%> yoi-Lu-ha shall carry רַגְלֶ֔יהָ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lei-ha, feet מֵֽרָח֖וֹק <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok her afar off לָגֽוּר׃ <S%H1481><s%> la-Gur. to sojourn

מִ֚י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יָעַ֣ץ <S%H3289><s%> ya-'Atz Who hath taken this counsel זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> Zot, likewise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against צֹ֖ר <S%H6865><s%> tzor against Tyre הַמַּֽעֲטִירָ֑ה <S%H5849><s%> ham-ma-'a-ti-Rah; the crowning אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Whose סֹחֲרֶ֙יה֙ <S%H5503><s%> so-cha-Reih [city] whose merchants שָׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rim, [are] princes כִּנְעָנֶ֖יהָ <S%H3669><s%> kin-'a-Nei-ha Canaanite נִכְבַּדֵּי־ <S%H3513><s%> nich-bad-dei- [are] the honourable אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. common

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts יְעָצָ֑הּ <S%H3289><s%> ye-'a-Tzah; hath purposed לְחַלֵּל֙ <S%H2490><s%> le-chal-Lel it to stain גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> ge-'on the pride כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all צְבִ֔י <S%H6643><s%> tze-Vi, of all glory לְהָקֵ֖ל <S%H7043><s%> le-ha-Kel [and] to bring into contempt כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all נִכְבַּדֵּי־ <S%H3513><s%> nich-bad-dei- all the honourable אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. of the earth

עִבְרִ֥י <S%H5674><s%> 'iv-Ri Pass אַרְצֵ֖ךְ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzech through thy land כַּיְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> kay-'Or; as a river בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- O daughter תַּרְשִׁ֕ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> tar-Shish of Tarshish אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein There מֵ֥זַח <S%H4206><s%> Me-zach [there is] no more strength עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> od. more

יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do his hand נָטָ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> na-Tah He stretched out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam, over the sea הִרְגִּ֖יז <S%H7264><s%> hir-Giz he shook מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <S%H4467><s%> mam-la-Chot; the kingdoms יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah hath given a commandment אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- concerning כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, against the merchant לַשְׁמִ֖ד <S%H8045><s%> lash-Mid [city] to destroy מָעֻזְנֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H4581><s%> ma-'uz-Nei-ha. the strong

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no תוֹסִ֥יפִי <S%H3254><s%> to-Si-fi Thou shalt no more ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od You לַעְל֑וֹז <S%H5937><s%> la'-Loz; rejoice הַֽמְעֻשָּׁקָ֞ה <S%H6231><s%> ham-'ush-sha-Kah O thou oppressed בְּתוּלַ֣ת <S%H1330><s%> be-tu-Lat virgin בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- daughter צִיד֗וֹן <S%H6721><s%> tzi-Don, of Zidon; כִּתִּיִּים kit-ti-yim ככִּתִּים֙ <S%H3794><s%> kit-Tim Chittim קק֣וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> Ku-mi arise עֲבֹ֔רִי <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Vo-ri, pass over גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- even שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no יָנ֥וּחַֽ <S%H5117><s%> ya-Nu-ach there also shalt thou have no rest לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

הֵ֣ן׀ <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz Behold the land כַּשְׂדִּ֗ים <S%H3778><s%> kas-Dim, of the Chaldeans זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh he הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am this people לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not הָיָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah, was not אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur was not [till] the Assyrian יְסָדָ֣הּ <S%H3245><s%> ye-sa-Dah founded לְצִיִּ֑ים <S%H6728><s%> le-tzi-Yim; it for them that dwell in the wilderness הֵקִ֣ימוּ <S%H6965><s%> he-Ki-mu they set up; בְחִינָיו ve-chi-nav כבַחוּנָ֗יו <S%H971><s%> va-chu-Nav, tower קעֹרְרוּ֙ <S%H6209><s%> 'o-re-Ru thereof they raised up אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H759><s%> ar-me-no-Tei-ha, the palaces שָׂמָ֖הּ <S%H7760><s%> sa-Mah thereof [and] he brought לְמַפֵּלָֽה׃ <S%H4654><s%> le-map-pe-Lah. it to ruin

הֵילִ֖ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> hei-Li-lu Howl אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <S%H591><s%> o-ni-Yot ye ships תַּרְשִׁ֑ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> tar-Shish; of Tarshish כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שֻׁדַּ֖ד <S%H7703><s%> shud-Dad is laid waste מָעֻזְּכֶֽן׃ <S%H4581><s%> ma-'uz-ze-Chen. for your strength ס sa-Mek

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will happen בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he וְנִשְׁכַּ֤חַת <S%H7911><s%> ve-nish-Ka-chat shall be forgotten צֹר֙ <S%H6865><s%> tzor that Tyre שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im seventy שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years כִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> ki-Mei according to the days מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; of one מִקֵּ֞ץ <S%H7093><s%> mik-Ketz after the end שִׁבְעִ֤ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im of seventy שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh will happen לְצֹ֔ר <S%H6865><s%> le-Tzor, shall Tyre כְּשִׁירַ֖ת <S%H7892><s%> ke-shi-Rat sing הַזּוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H2181><s%> haz-zo-Nah. as an harlot

קְחִ֥י <S%H3947><s%> ke-Chi Take כִנּ֛וֹר <S%H3658><s%> chin-Nor an harp סֹ֥בִּי <S%H5437><s%> Sob-bi go about עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir the city זוֹנָ֣ה <S%H2181><s%> zo-Nah thou harlot נִשְׁכָּחָ֑ה <S%H7911><s%> nish-ka-Chah; that hast been forgotten הֵיטִ֤יבִי <S%H3190><s%> hei-Ti-vi make sweet נַגֵּן֙ <S%H5059><s%> nag-Gen melody הַרְבִּי־ <S%H7235><s%> har-bi- sing many שִׁ֔יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, songs לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that תִּזָּכֵֽרִי׃ <S%H2142><s%> tiz-za-Che-ri. that thou mayest be remembered

וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will come מִקֵּ֣ץ׀ <S%H7093><s%> mik-Ketz And it shall come to pass after the end שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im of seventy שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years יִפְקֹ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> yif-Kod will visit יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹ֔ר <S%H6865><s%> Tzor, Tyre וְשָׁבָ֖ה <S%H7725><s%> ve-sha-Vah and she shall turn לְאֶתְנַנָּ֑ה <S%H868><s%> le-'et-nan-Nah; to her hire וְזָֽנְתָ֛ה <S%H2181><s%> ve-za-ne-Tah and shall commit fornication אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <S%H4467><s%> mam-le-Chot with all the kingdoms הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the world עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah. of the earth

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah will become סַחְרָ֜הּ <S%H5504><s%> sach-Rah And her merchandise וְאֶתְנַנָּ֗הּ <S%H868><s%> ve-'et-nan-Nah, and her hire קֹ֚דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh shall be holiness לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, to the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֵֽאָצֵ֖ר <S%H686><s%> ye-'a-Tzer it shall not be treasured וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or יֵֽחָסֵ֑ן <S%H2630><s%> ye-cha-Sen; nor laid up כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לַיֹּשְׁבִ֞ים <S%H3427><s%> lai-yo-she-Vim shall be for them that dwell לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh will become סַחְרָ֔הּ <S%H5504><s%> sach-Rah, for her merchandise לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> le-'e-Chol to eat לְשָׂבְעָ֖ה <S%H7654><s%> le-sa-ve-'Ah sufficiently וְלִמְכַסֶּ֥ה <S%H4374><s%> ve-lim-chas-Seh clothing עָתִֽיק׃ <S%H6266><s%> 'a-Tik. and for durable פ Peh
